name: Dino Jump 3D
description:
Dino Jump 3D is a simple but funny endless Runner that gets more difficult over type. Use the arrow keys or wasd to move left and right and to jump to avoid cacti and pterosaurs. how far can you get without collding? Can you give this Dino the run of his live?

If you have any issues, or ideas feel free to share them with me on the git repository discussion:  https://github.com/AliOcasha/DinoGame3D/discussions

The Models and Textures used in this game are avaible at : https://www.cgtrader.com/3d-models/various/various-models/dino-jump-3d-models-and-textures

And feel free to share your opinion here in the comments.

Have fun and good luck!
